title: I think the challenger skins should be a series
body: I feel as though if they released a limited time challenger skin like ahri's to other huge impact mid laners,It would be awesome.Imagine challenger zed!

replies.body: The Challenger skin line is actually the antithesis to Championship. :]
It is a series,Ahri was the 1st.The next one should come out at the start of next season.
